6032h, 4407m, 27625e, 20200w xdb-
Rally point.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. The sound of a low growl draws attention to Gunholf, a winged wolf. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. A frisky goat kid bounds about. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. Like a mountain against the wind, a storm bull is standing here, motionless. A llama cria bounds energetically about the area. Pausing nearby on delicate legs is a bashful fawn.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

There is currently a City credit sale in progress.
----[ Targossas City announcement ]----
The focus for the time-being is solely on eradicating all traces of the visible influence of the Skylord. All attention should be given over to defiling His shrines. Time wasted on defiling shrines to Sartan, Ourania, Babel and Twilight only gives Vastar's Order the opportunity to rebuild. We shall continue our work in stamping out what feeble efforts the rest of our enemies put forth when we are finished with Vastar.
---------------------------------------

6032h, 4455m, 27625e, 20195w exdb-
ANNOUNCE NEWS #4124                                     (05/06/2014 at 00:24)  
From   : Melchior, the Guide Master
To     : Everyone
Subject: Call for Guides
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
We are accepting Guide applications again. You must be a mentor and have at least 500 hours of playing time to apply. Whilst the work is demanding sometimes, many people have found it to be a rewarding and enjoyable experience. If you have applied before, we would still welcome your application. Prior to submitting your application please read HELP BECOMING A GUIDE.

Please send us an application in the following format:
Character name
Real life name
Real life age
Real life occupation
Times that you are usually online in GMT (This is actually quite important - If you don't understand time zones, please read HELP GMT or look up what your local time zone is somewhere on the internet).

A _short_ paragraph about why you think you would make a good guide.

Please mail the application to guides@achaea.com.

Melchior, the Guide Master


Penned by My hand on the 14th of Sarapin, in the year 654 AF.
6032h, 4455m, 27625e, 20195w exdb-
ANNOUNCE NEWS #4125                                     (05/06/2014 at 01:39)  
From   : Tecton, the Terraformer
To     : Everyone
Subject: Classlead changes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I'm sure you've had enough time to read over the last -massive- list of classlead changes, so we're here to inundate you again! Here's all the details of this second (and final) batch of changes for this round:

Apostasy
--------
* CORRUPT has been added to the skill.

Chivalry
--------
* GRIPPING a weapon will still allow it to be sheathed. Also applies to Blademasters.

Devotion
--------
* ILLUMINATE range has been vastly increased.
* ILLUMINATE has had its devotion, equilibrium, and willpower costs reduced.
* PENITENCE has had its devotion and equilibrium costs reduced.
* PENITENCE will return devotion to the bestower, regardless of who lands the killing blow.
* Various other small tweaks and bugfixes to PENITENCE to ensure that it fires consistently.

Domination
----------
* DANAEUS now gives vertigo affliction.
* NEMESIS will now give epilepsy instead of vertigo.
* SKYRAX will now correctly take the target off-balance when hit.
* AB DOMINATION <entity> will now bring up the corresponding ability.
[Type MORE if you wish to continue reading. (30% shown)]
6032h, 4455m, 27625e, 20195w exdb-
[File continued via MORE]

Elementalism
------------
* THORNREND has had its damage formula reworked.
* THORNREND (when targeted against a body part) will now do more damage against prone targets and less against standing.
* LACERATE damage now scales with intelligence.
* LACERATE equilibrium cost has been slightly reduced.
* GEYSER will now correctly take the target off-balance when hit.

Evileye
-------
* TRUESTARE now has a defence component that will allow the apostate to stare through their mindseye while blind.

Healing
-------
* DISRUPT no longer has a cooldown.
* Afflictions caused by DISRUPT are now curable with lobelia/argentum.

Misc./General
-------------
* Myrrh now increases the number of lessons one can learn in a session by five.
* The CLASS queue has been added to the queueing system for class-specific balances.
* The EQBAL queue has been added to the queueing system for abilities that require balance and equilibrium.
* WORLDBURN duration has been reduced.
* PILGRIMAGE has been added as a new shrine power.
* Sileris and quicksilver application times have been increased.
* Slickness affliction will now strip sileris/quicksilver.
* SMOKEing pipes now carries a balance.
* Weaponry attacks are no longer possible while off balance from any class-specific balance (for non-weapon classes).

[Type MORE if you wish to continue reading. (56% shown)]
6032h, 4437m, 27625e, 20195w exdb-
(Newbie): Juliet says, "What do you sound like? A shrill voice, or an Arcadian accent? Use HELP VOICE to let the world know."
6032h, 4455m, 27625e, 20195w exdb-
[File continued via MORE]
Necromancy
-----------
* BLACKWIND willpower drain has been reduced.

Pranks
------
* JUGGLE can now accept multiple items. Balance costs will scale based on the number of items added to the juggling.
* ITCHINGPOWER has been reworked, it will now give periodic impatience to the victim.

Puppetry/Vodun
--------------
* CRIPPLE fashion cost has been reduced.

Riding
------
* Mounted followers will now be able to follow other galloping/dashing adventurers.

Runelore
--------
* ALGIZ will no longer reduce damage from other players for non-runelorists.
* LAGUZ, LAGUA, LAGUL can now only be sketched on runeblades.

Seafaring
---------
* FIREWEAPON balances have been reduced (for firing and loading).
* WAVECALL maximum distance has been reduced.

Spirituality
------------
* SMITE damage against denizen has been increased slightly.
[Type MORE if you wish to continue reading. (73% shown)]
6032h, 4455m, 27625e, 20195w exdb-
[File continued via MORE]
* CHASTEN equilibrium cost has been reduced slightly.

Subterfuge
----------
* LIGHTWALLs will now remove darkshade remission when passing through them.
* LIGHTWALLs will act as a source of daylight for those with the darkshade affliction.
* FLAY will now deliver a venom from a whip/lash assuming it can hit. This only applies to rebounding and shield flays.

Survival
--------
* CLEARING has been added to the skill.

Tarot
-----
* SUPERCHARGE has been lowered in the skill.
* DEATH has been raised in the skill.

Tattoos
-------
* Slashed and lacerated throat afflictions are no longer cured by the tree tattoo.
* Only one starburst may be inked on the body at once.

Tekura
------
* AXEKICK has been reworked, it is now faster, and its damage scales based on the number of damaged limbs.

Woodlore
--------
* Handaxe speed and damage formulae have been adjusted.

[Type MORE if you wish to continue reading. (90% shown)]

[File continued via MORE]
Venom
-----
* BITE will now bypass denizen shields.

A massive thank you goes out to everyone who took the time to submit classleads! We're pleased to have been able to bring you so many changes based upon your submissions.

There are some big and far-reaching changes in this batch, so we'll be keeping an eye on things and adjusting them where needed. As always, if there's something that's not quite right, please file a BUG with as much information as possible.

Cripple (Puppetry)                            Known: Yes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Syntax:            PUPPET CRIPPLE
                   
Extra Information: Required: 25
                   Used: 7

Works on/against:  Adventurers
Details:
Break all the limbs of a victim.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

6032h, 4473m, 27625e, 20200w exdb-
Rally point.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. The sound of a low growl draws attention to Gunholf, a winged wolf. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. A frisky goat kid bounds about. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. Like a mountain against the wind, a storm bull is standing here, motionless. A llama cria bounds energetically about the area. Pausing nearby on delicate legs is a bashful fawn.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

6032h, 4439m, 27625e, 20200w exdb-
Juggling (Pranks)                             Known: Yes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Syntax:            JUGGLE <item1> [item2] [item3]
                   JUGGLED
                   JUGGLE STOP
Details:
You may juggle up to two items at once, or three if you have reached Transcendent pranks. Once you are juggling, you may throw the items you're juggling at a greatly decreased cost in balance. JUGGLED will show you what, if anything, you are juggling. Be aware that juggling comes with an endurance drain.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

6032h, 4459m, 27625e, 20196w exdb-
You must have one empty hand to juggle.

The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. 6032h, 4459m, 27145e, 20196w exdb-
Rally point.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. The sound of a low growl draws attention to Gunholf, a winged wolf. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. A frisky goat kid bounds about. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. Like a mountain against the wind, a storm bull is standing here, motionless. A llama cria bounds energetically about the area. Pausing nearby on delicate legs is a bashful fawn.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

6032h, 4443m, 27625e, 20196w exdb-
ANNOUNCE NEWS #4125                                     (05/06/2014 at 01:39)  
From   : Tecton, the Terraformer
To     : Everyone
Subject: Classlead changes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I'm sure you've had enough time to read over the last -massive- list of classlead changes, so we're here to inundate you again! Here's all the details of this second (and final) batch of changes for this round:

Apostasy
--------
* CORRUPT has been added to the skill.

Chivalry
--------
* GRIPPING a weapon will still allow it to be sheathed. Also applies to Blademasters.

Devotion
--------
* ILLUMINATE range has been vastly increased.
* ILLUMINATE has had its devotion, equilibrium, and willpower costs reduced.
* PENITENCE has had its devotion and equilibrium costs reduced.
* PENITENCE will return devotion to the bestower, regardless of who lands the killing blow.
* Various other small tweaks and bugfixes to PENITENCE to ensure that it fires consistently.

Domination
----------
* DANAEUS now gives vertigo affliction.
* NEMESIS will now give epilepsy instead of vertigo.
* SKYRAX will now correctly take the target off-balance when hit.
* AB DOMINATION <entity> will now bring up the corresponding ability.
[Type MORE if you wish to continue reading. (30% shown)]
6032h, 4473m, 27625e, 20200w exdb-
[File continued via MORE]

Elementalism
------------
* THORNREND has had its damage formula reworked.
* THORNREND (when targeted against a body part) will now do more damage against prone targets and less against standing.
* LACERATE damage now scales with intelligence.
* LACERATE equilibrium cost has been slightly reduced.
* GEYSER will now correctly take the target off-balance when hit.

Evileye
-------
* TRUESTARE now has a defence component that will allow the apostate to stare through their mindseye while blind.

Healing
-------
* DISRUPT no longer has a cooldown.
* Afflictions caused by DISRUPT are now curable with lobelia/argentum.

Misc./General
-------------
* Myrrh now increases the number of lessons one can learn in a session by five.
* The CLASS queue has been added to the queueing system for class-specific balances.
* The EQBAL queue has been added to the queueing system for abilities that require balance and equilibrium.
* WORLDBURN duration has been reduced.
* PILGRIMAGE has been added as a new shrine power.
* Sileris and quicksilver application times have been increased.
* Slickness affliction will now strip sileris/quicksilver.
* SMOKEing pipes now carries a balance.
* Weaponry attacks are no longer possible while off balance from any class-specific balance (for non-weapon classes).

[Type MORE if you wish to continue reading. (56% shown)]

6032h, 4453m, 27625e, 20200w exdb-
[File continued via MORE]
Necromancy
-----------
* BLACKWIND willpower drain has been reduced.

Pranks
------
* JUGGLE can now accept multiple items. Balance costs will scale based on the number of items added to the juggling.
* ITCHINGPOWER has been reworked, it will now give periodic impatience to the victim.

Puppetry/Vodun
--------------
* CRIPPLE fashion cost has been reduced.

Riding
------
* Mounted followers will now be able to follow other galloping/dashing adventurers.

Runelore
--------
* ALGIZ will no longer reduce damage from other players for non-runelorists.
* LAGUZ, LAGUA, LAGUL can now only be sketched on runeblades.

Seafaring
---------
* FIREWEAPON balances have been reduced (for firing and loading).
* WAVECALL maximum distance has been reduced.

Spirituality
------------
* SMITE damage against denizen has been increased slightly.
[Type MORE if you wish to continue reading. (73% shown)]
6032h, 4455m, 27625e, 20195w exdb-
(Argent Ward): You say, "Wait."
6032h, 4473m, 27625e, 20196w exdb-
(Argent Ward): You say, "Holy fuck."
6032h, 4453m, 27625e, 20194w exdb-
(Argent Ward): You say, "Jesters get impatience."
6032h, 4439m, 27625e, 20196w exdb-
(Argent Ward): You say, "Holy shit."
6032h, 4453m, 27625e, 20194w exdb-
[File continued via MORE]
* CHASTEN equilibrium cost has been reduced slightly.

Subterfuge
----------
* LIGHTWALLs will now remove darkshade remission when passing through them.
* LIGHTWALLs will act as a source of daylight for those with the darkshade affliction.
* FLAY will now deliver a venom from a whip/lash assuming it can hit. This only applies to rebounding and shield flays.

Survival
--------
* CLEARING has been added to the skill.

Tarot
-----
* SUPERCHARGE has been lowered in the skill.
* DEATH has been raised in the skill.

Tattoos
-------
* Slashed and lacerated throat afflictions are no longer cured by the tree tattoo.
* Only one starburst may be inked on the body at once.

Tekura
------
* AXEKICK has been reworked, it is now faster, and its damage scales based on the number of damaged limbs.

Woodlore
--------
* Handaxe speed and damage formulae have been adjusted.

[Type MORE if you wish to continue reading. (90% shown)]

[File continued via MORE]
Venom
-----
* BITE will now bypass denizen shields.

A massive thank you goes out to everyone who took the time to submit classleads! We're pleased to have been able to bring you so many changes based upon your submissions.

There are some big and far-reaching changes in this batch, so we'll be keeping an eye on things and adjusting them where needed. As always, if there's something that's not quite right, please file a BUG with as much information as possible.
6032h, 4440m, 27625e, 20196w exdb-
Rally point.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. A bustling farrier's yard.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton.  Banek, of Targossas is riding on an ivory peryton. He wields a meteoric longsword in each hand. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. Earth Magus, Alea al'Dejan-Darkthorne, Eye of Nature is here. She wields a vine-wreathed sylvanic quarterstaff in both hands.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.

Rally point.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. The sound of a low growl draws attention to Gunholf, a winged wolf. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. A frisky goat kid bounds about. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. Like a mountain against the wind, a storm bull is standing here, motionless. A llama cria bounds energetically about the area. Pausing nearby on delicate legs is a bashful fawn.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. The sound of a low growl draws attention to Gunholf, a winged wolf. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. A frisky goat kid bounds about. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. Like a mountain against the wind, a storm bull is standing here, motionless. A llama cria bounds energetically about the area. Pausing nearby on delicate legs is a bashful fawn.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.
Gunholf's ears perk to your arrival as he acknowledges you with deep amber eyes.

A bustling farrier's yard.

Targa Road through low hills (road).

Targa Road through low hills (road).
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. Warm, nacarat fire illuminates a sandstone shrine to the Lord of the Righteous. An icewall is here, blocking passage to the west. A common red admiral butterfly flits about over your head. There are 2 plumbum flakes in a group here. A smudge of brick-red cinnabar dusts the ground here. A small pinch of realgar crystals rests upon the ground. A yellow-bellied marmot whistles to himself as he scurries rapidly about. A purple crystal of calamine is here. Nestled into the ground is a small chunk of potash crystal. There are 12 corpses of an Unsidhe Banshee here. A dull grey chip of magnesium rests on the ground. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light.  Soldier Iskla Rian is here. The Blue Dragon Dunn's imposing form looms.
You see exits leading northeast and west.

0h, 3453m, 27625e, 19434w ex-

Arched stone bridge crossing the Silverveil.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. There are 2 Riverwall bow-maidens here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. An icewall is here, blocking passage to the northeast. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A flake of cuprum gleams red-orange on the ground. A small pinch of realgar crystals rests upon the ground. There are 3 pinches of ground malachite in 3 groups here. There are 2 bloodroot leaves in 2 groups here. There are 2 pinches of ground cinnabar in 2 groups here. There are 2 plumbum flakes in a group here. A shimmering flake of argentum rests upon the ground. A metallic flake of ferrum rests on the ground here, in danger of blowing away. A small flake of gleaming aurum rests upon the ground. A purple crystal of calamine is here.
You see exits leading northeast and southwest.

Arched stone bridge crossing the Silverveil.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. There are 2 Riverwall bow-maidens here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. A flake of cuprum gleams red-orange on the ground. A small pinch of realgar crystals rests upon the ground. There are 3 pinches of ground malachite in 3 groups here. There are 2 bloodroot leaves in 2 groups here. There are 2 pinches of ground cinnabar in 2 groups here. There are 2 plumbum flakes in a group here. A shimmering flake of argentum rests upon the ground. A metallic flake of ferrum rests on the ground here, in danger of blowing away. A small flake of gleaming aurum rests upon the ground. A purple crystal of calamine is here.
You see exits leading northeast and southwest.

Rally point.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. The sound of a low growl draws attention to Gunholf, a winged wolf. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. A frisky goat kid bounds about. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. Like a mountain against the wind, a storm bull is standing here, motionless. A llama cria bounds energetically about the area. Pausing nearby on delicate legs is a bashful fawn. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

A bustling farrier's yard.

A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. There are 2 guardian angels here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A fiery efreeti spins madly here. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground.  Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right. Oathsworn Kadin is here. He wields a Shield of Absorption in his left hand and an elemental staff in his right. Purest Heart Dhaia Bayt al-Azhan is here. She wields a spiritual mace in her right hand. Banek, of Targossas is riding on an ivory peryton. He wields a meteoric longsword in each hand. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand.

The Champions' Bridge.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. There are 2 Blackstone swordsmen here. There are 2 Riverwall bow-maidens here. A noble snow-white falcon glides to and fro here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Hung from the western column of the arch that forms the city gates, a gilt-edged indigo scroll proudly displays the Bloodsworn decree on innocence.  A huge statue of the Scimitar of Yen-Sorte stands here, thrusting skywards.
Approaching the Champions' Bridge (road).
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A rune shaped like a butterfly has been sketched into the ground here. A rune like an open eye has been sketched into the ground here. An obsidian eye sigil is here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Frothing at the mouth and pacing about, a zombie kitten snarls at passers-by. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance.  Daijin Kross Da'Navi, Tempest of Neraeos is here. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Neraeos in his right hand. The Blue Dragon Dunn's imposing form looms. Eldritch General Hirst da'Miras is here, shrouded. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields prismatic shield of translucent crystal in his left hand and an ebony boomerang inlaid with gold in his right. The Blue Dragon Austere's imposing form looms.
You can see no further.

An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. There are 2 guardian angels here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A fiery efreeti spins madly here. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground.  Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right. Purest Heart Dhaia Bayt al-Azhan is here. She wields a spiritual mace in her right hand. Banek, of Targossas is riding on an ivory peryton. He wields a meteoric longsword in each hand. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. Oathsworn Kadin is here. He wields a Shield of Absorption in his left hand and an elemental staff in his right.

She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right. Purest Heart Dhaia Bayt al-Azhan is here. She wields a spiritual mace in her right hand. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. There are 2 guardian angels here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground.  Banek, of Targossas is riding on an ivory peryton. He wields a meteoric longsword in each hand. Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right. Purest Heart Dhaia Bayt al-Azhan is here. She wields a spiritual mace in her right hand. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. The soul of Siduri roams the land, bodiless. Soldier Iskla Rian is here.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.

Gateway to Targossas.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. There are 2 Blackstone swordsmen here. There are 2 Riverwall bow-maidens here. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. Resplendent rays of white and gold suffuse the smooth contours of a slender glass pillar, a fervent symbol of Light's resolve. There are 8 pieces of fruit in a group here. There are 5 corpses of a yellow scorpion here. There are 5 corpses of a large black scorpion here. There are 4 corpses of a giant red scorpion here. Someone has scattered some diamond dust here. There are 2 corpses of a giant sea turtle here. A giant sea turtle lies in a pool of blood amidst her broken shell. There are 3 corpses of a spearhead shark here. There are 3 corpses of a barnacle encrusted oyster here. A piece of dried-out kelp has been left here. Some irid moss has been left here. A bloodroot leaf lies here. A fairly large pile of golden sovereigns twinkles and gleams.  Soldier Ernam is here, calm and relaxed.
The Champions' Bridge.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. There are 2 Blackstone swordsmen here. There are 2 Riverwall bow-maidens here. A noble snow-white falcon glides to and fro here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Hung from the western column of the arch that forms the city gates, a gilt-edged indigo scroll proudly displays the Bloodsworn decree on innocence.  A huge statue of the Scimitar of Yen-Sorte stands here, thrusting skywards.

An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. There are 2 guardian angels here. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. A bustling farrier's yard.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. There are 2 guardian angels here. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light.  Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right. Soldier Iskla Rian is here. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. Purest Heart Dhaia Bayt al-Azhan is here. She wields a spiritual mace in her right hand. Oathsworn Kadin is here. He wields a Shield of Absorption in his left hand and an elemental staff in his right. Banek, of Targossas is riding on an ivory peryton. He wields a meteoric longsword in each hand.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.

A bustling farrier's yard.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here.  Phantom Asp, Siduri Azagnanna is here. She wields a Lupine bow in both hands. Soldier Iskla Rian is here. Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand.

The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right. Oathsworn Kadin is here. He wields a Shield of Absorption in his left hand and an elemental staff in his right. He is surrounded by one reflection of himself. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. The sound of a low growl draws attention to Gunholf, a winged wolf. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. A frisky goat kid bounds about. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A llama cria bounds energetically about the area. Pausing nearby on delicate legs is a bashful fawn. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

A bustling farrier's yard.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton.  Phantom Asp, Siduri Azagnanna is here. She wields a Lupine bow in both hands. Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. Banek, of Targossas is riding on an ivory peryton. He wields a meteoric longsword in each hand. Oathsworn Kadin is here. He wields a Shield of Absorption in his left hand and an elemental staff in his right. He is surrounded by one reflection of himself.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.

An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton.  Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. Phantom Asp, Siduri Azagnanna is here. She wields a Lupine bow in both hands. Oathsworn Kadin is here. A bustling farrier's yard.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton.  Phantom Asp, Siduri Azagnanna is here. She wields a Lupine bow in both hands. Oathsworn Kadin is here. He wields a Shield of Absorption in his left hand and an elemental staff in his right. He is surrounded by one reflection of himself. Banek, of Targossas is riding on an ivory peryton. He wields a meteoric longsword in each hand. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.

A bustling farrier's yard.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A nebulous water weird is here.  Phantom Asp, Siduri Azagnanna is here. She wields a Lupine bow in both hands. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. Oathsworn Kadin is here. He wields a Shield of Absorption in his left hand and an elemental staff in his right. He is surrounded by one reflection of himself. Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right. Banek, of Targossas is riding on an ivory peryton. He wields a meteoric longsword in each hand.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.

A bustling farrier's yard.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. There are 3 throwing axes here.  Phantom Asp, Siduri Azagnanna is here. She wields a Lupine bow in both hands. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.

The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here.  Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. Phantom Asp, Siduri Azagnanna is here. She wields a Lupine bow in both hands. Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right.

A bustling farrier's yard.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here.  Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. Phantom Asp, Siduri Azagnanna is here. She wields a Lupine bow in both hands. Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.

Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi (male Dwarf).
His date of birth is hidden by the sand of Aeon.
He is ranked 232nd in Achaea.
He is an extremely credible character.
He is not known for acts of infamy.
He is a Duke in Cyrene.
He is a Trainee in the army of Cyrene.
He is considered to be approximately 110% of your might.
He is a mentor and able to take on proteges.
His motto: 'To sleep, perchance to dream.. it's called "heartstop."'
He has been divorced once.
He bears the arms: Sable, a dove volant Argent.

Slow (Puppetry)                               Known: Yes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Syntax:            PUPPET SLOW
                   
Extra Information: Fashions:
                   Required: 20
                   Used    : 10
                   1 (If the speed defense is stripped)

Works on/against:  Adventurers
Details:
Slow the movement of your victim through time.

An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here.  Phantom Asp, Siduri Azagnanna is here. She wields a Lupine bow in both hands. Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.

Warehouses along Harbour Way.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. The Champions' Bridge.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. There are 2 Blackstone swordsmen here. There are 2 Riverwall bow-maidens here. A noble snow-white falcon glides to and fro here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Hung from the western column of the arch that forms the city gates, a gilt-edged indigo scroll proudly displays the Bloodsworn decree on innocence. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub.  Miharo, Faithful of Light is here. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand.

A bustling farrier's yard.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub.  Miharo, Faithful of Light is here. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. Predicant Lyndee Faelithar is here. She wields a sapphire-inlaid shield in her left hand and a silver staff of the elements in her right.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.

A bustling farrier's yard.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. There are 12 throwing axes here.  Miharo, Faithful of Light is here. Banek, of Targossas is riding on an ivory peryton. He wields a meteoric longsword in each hand. Soldier Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand.

ANNOUNCE NEWS #4125                                     (05/06/2014 at 01:39)  
From   : Tecton, the Terraformer
To     : Everyone
Subject: Classlead changes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I'm sure you've had enough time to read over the last -massive- list of classlead changes, so we're here to inundate you again! Here's all the details of this second (and final) batch of changes for this round:

Apostasy
--------
* CORRUPT has been added to the skill.

Chivalry
--------
* GRIPPING a weapon will still allow it to be sheathed. Also applies to Blademasters.

Devotion
--------
* ILLUMINATE range has been vastly increased.
* ILLUMINATE has had its devotion, equilibrium, and willpower costs reduced.
* PENITENCE has had its devotion and equilibrium costs reduced.
* PENITENCE will return devotion to the bestower, regardless of who lands the killing blow.
* Various other small tweaks and bugfixes to PENITENCE to ensure that it fires consistently.

Domination
----------
* DANAEUS now gives vertigo affliction.
* NEMESIS will now give epilepsy instead of vertigo.
* SKYRAX will now correctly take the target off-balance when hit.
* AB DOMINATION <entity> will now bring up the corresponding ability.
[Type MORE if you wish to continue reading. (30% shown)]
6344h, 4750m, 23383e, 21573w cexkdb-
You inhale deeply and begin holding your breath.
6344h, 4750m, 23383e, 21573w cexkdb-
Kray tells you, "No one else gets the benefits."
6344h, 4768m, 23383e, 21569w cexkdb-
You cease holding your breath and exhale loudly.
[File continued via MORE]

Elementalism
------------
* THORNREND has had its damage formula reworked.
* THORNREND (when targeted against a body part) will now do more damage against prone targets and less against standing.
* LACERATE damage now scales with intelligence.
* LACERATE equilibrium cost has been slightly reduced.
* GEYSER will now correctly take the target off-balance when hit.

Evileye
-------
* TRUESTARE now has a defence component that will allow the apostate to stare through their mindseye while blind.

Healing
-------
* DISRUPT no longer has a cooldown.
* Afflictions caused by DISRUPT are now curable with lobelia/argentum.

Misc./General
-------------
* Myrrh now increases the number of lessons one can learn in a session by five.
* The CLASS queue has been added to the queueing system for class-specific balances.
* The EQBAL queue has been added to the queueing system for abilities that require balance and equilibrium.
* WORLDBURN duration has been reduced.
* PILGRIMAGE has been added as a new shrine power.
* Sileris and quicksilver application times have been increased.
* Slickness affliction will now strip sileris/quicksilver.
* SMOKEing pipes now carries a balance.
* Weaponry attacks are no longer possible while off balance from any class-specific balance (for non-weapon classes).

[Type MORE if you wish to continue reading. (56% shown)]
6344h, 4768m, 23403e, 21581w cexkdb-
You inhale deeply and begin holding your breath.
6344h, 4768m, 23403e, 21581w cexkdb-
You cease holding your breath and exhale loudly.
You tell Kray Sehr'asa, "Nice."
6344h, 4753m, 23403e, 21577w cexkdb-
You inhale deeply and begin holding your breath.
6344h, 4753m, 23403e, 21577w cexkdb-
You cease holding your breath and exhale loudly.
[File continued via MORE]
Necromancy
-----------
* BLACKWIND willpower drain has been reduced.

Pranks
------
* JUGGLE can now accept multiple items. Balance costs will scale based on the number of items added to the juggling.
* ITCHINGPOWER has been reworked, it will now give periodic impatience to the victim.

Puppetry/Vodun
--------------
* CRIPPLE fashion cost has been reduced.

Riding
------
* Mounted followers will now be able to follow other galloping/dashing adventurers.

Runelore
--------
* ALGIZ will no longer reduce damage from other players for non-runelorists.
* LAGUZ, LAGUA, LAGUL can now only be sketched on runeblades.

Seafaring
---------
* FIREWEAPON balances have been reduced (for firing and loading).
* WAVECALL maximum distance has been reduced.

Spirituality
------------
* SMITE damage against denizen has been increased slightly.
[Type MORE if you wish to continue reading. (73% shown)]
6344h, 4753m, 23423e, 21589w cexkdb-
You inhale deeply and begin holding your breath.
6344h, 4753m, 23423e, 21589w cexkdb-
You cease holding your breath and exhale loudly.
[File continued via MORE]
* CHASTEN equilibrium cost has been reduced slightly.

Subterfuge
----------
* LIGHTWALLs will now remove darkshade remission when passing through them.
* LIGHTWALLs will act as a source of daylight for those with the darkshade affliction.
* FLAY will now deliver a venom from a whip/lash assuming it can hit. This only applies to rebounding and shield flays.

Survival
--------
* CLEARING has been added to the skill.

Tarot
-----
* SUPERCHARGE has been lowered in the skill.
* DEATH has been raised in the skill.

Tattoos
-------
* Slashed and lacerated throat afflictions are no longer cured by the tree tattoo.
* Only one starburst may be inked on the body at once.

Tekura
------
* AXEKICK has been reworked, it is now faster, and its damage scales based on the number of damaged limbs.

Woodlore
--------
* Handaxe speed and damage formulae have been adjusted.

[Type MORE if you wish to continue reading. (90% shown)]
6344h, 4765m, 23483e, 21605w cexkdb-
You inhale deeply and begin holding your breath.
6344h, 4765m, 23483e, 21605w cexkdb-
You cease holding your breath and exhale loudly.
[File continued via MORE]
Venom
-----
* BITE will now bypass denizen shields.

A massive thank you goes out to everyone who took the time to submit classleads! We're pleased to have been able to bring you so many changes based upon your submissions.

There are some big and far-reaching changes in this batch, so we'll be keeping an eye on things and adjusting them where needed. As always, if there's something that's not quite right, please file a BUG with as much information as possible.

Rally point.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. The sound of a low growl draws attention to Gunholf, a winged wolf. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. A frisky goat kid bounds about. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A llama cria bounds energetically about the area. Pausing nearby on delicate legs is a bashful fawn. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A bloodroot leaf lies here.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

Extra Information: Fashions:

Details:

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A smattering of clouds fills the sky, lacing it with spiderwebs of grey. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. The sound of a low growl draws attention to Gunholf, a winged wolf. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. A frisky goat kid bounds about. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A llama cria bounds energetically about the area. Pausing nearby on delicate legs is a bashful fawn. Heawon Rousseau stands here looking happy.

Itchpowder (Pranks)                           Known: Yes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Syntax:            SLIP <person> ITCHPOWDER
Works on/against:  Adventurers
Details:
Like the mickey, once you've gotten some itchpowder through the Props
ability, you can slip it on someone, making him or her itch
uncontrollably until an epidermal salve is applied.

This will cause the unfortunate individual to be periodically afflicted
with impatience.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A bustling farrier's yard.
A smattering of clouds fills the sky, lacing it with spiderwebs of grey. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. There are 12 throwing axes here. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A nebulous water weird is here.  Miharo, Faithful of Light is here. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. Apostle Daeir Wintermourne, Voice of the Fallen is here, impassive. High Advisor Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Banek, of Targossas is riding on an ivory peryton. He wields a meteoric longsword in each hand. Oathsworn Kadin is here. He wields a Shield of Absorption in his left hand and an elemental staff in his right.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.

A bustling farrier's yard.
A smattering of clouds fills the sky, lacing it with spiderwebs of grey. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. There are 12 throwing axes here.  Miharo, Faithful of Light is here. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. High Advisor Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Apostle Daeir Wintermourne, Voice of the Fallen is here, impassive. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is seated here.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.

   CREDITS CONVERT <number> TO LESSONS

   CREDITS MEMBERSHIP TRANSFER <number>

   CREDITS FOR SALE

   CREDITS BUY <number> AT <max gold per credit>
   CREDITS SELL <number> AT <gold per credit>
Cancel any offer to sell:
   CREDITS SELL NONE

Handmade from fine clay, this small vial boasts smooth sides that taper down into a delicate teardrop shape. Rising from the top, a small spout enables one to drink from it, and is stoppered by a tiny cork that hangs from a length of woven string. Gleaming across the surface, deeply engraved runes shimmer against a glass-like glaze, its tempestuous sea-like hues changing in the light.

A bustling farrier's yard.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. There are 12 throwing axes here. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton.  Miharo, Faithful of Light is here. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. Banek, of Targossas is riding on an ivory peryton. He wields a meteoric longsword in each hand. High Advisor Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. The Golden Dragon Morthif's imposing form looms. Apostle Daeir Wintermourne, Voice of the Fallen is here, impassive.

A bustling farrier's yard.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A rugged war goat stands here, gnawing on the leather bit of its reins. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Snorting excitedly, a heavy horse stands here. An elegant white letter is in danger of being soiled here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Stretching its wings in an impressive display is an ebony pegasus, its dark coat absorbing the surrounding light. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. There are 12 throwing axes here. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton.  Miharo, Faithful of Light is here. Banek, of Targossas is riding on an ivory peryton. He wields a meteoric longsword in each hand. Apostle Daeir Wintermourne, Voice of the Fallen is here, impassive. Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here, shrouded. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is seated here. High Advisor Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.
